S04n402:1: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkabhī bhagavantametadavocat–kuto bhagavan ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā prāpyate?
S04n402:3: na ca tathāgatā jānanti prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtāḥ |
S04n402:4: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–yadbhagavan tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā na jānanti?
S04n402:5: bhagavānāha–kulaputra sā ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā tvavalokiteśvarasya paramahṛdayam |
S04n402:6: yaśca paramahṛdayaṃ jānāti sa mokṣaṃ jānāti |
S04n402:7: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–asti bhagavan kecitsattvā ye ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ jānanti?
S04n402:10: eṣā durāsadā aprameyā yoginastathāgatā jānanti prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtāḥ |
S04n402:11: asyāḥ kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarīmahāvidyāyāḥ kāraṇena sarve tathāgatāḥ ṣoḍaśakalyāṇasaṃkhyeyāḥ paribhramitāḥ prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtāḥ kuto jānanti ?
S04n402:15: puṇyavantaste sattvā ye ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ satataparigrahaṃ japābhiyuktā bhavanti |
S04n402:31: ye ca tava kulaputra kukṣigatāḥ prāṇinaḥ,
S04n402:33: yaḥ kaścidimāṃ dhārayet ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ kāyagatāṃ kaṇṭhagatāṃ vā,
S04n402:37: yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ japanti so'kṣayapratibhāno bhavati |
S04n402:42: yasya kasyaciducchavasyocchvāsapraśvāsaṃ dadāti maitryā vā dveṣeṇa vā,
S04n402:47: darśanamātreṇa strī vā puruṣo vā dārikā vā mṛgapakṣiṇo gomahiṣagardabhādayaśca cakṣurdarśanenāpi paśyanti,
S04n402:51: evaṃ tu ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ japamānasya saṃcodano bhavati ||
S04n402:52: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–kathaṃ bhagavan labheyamahaṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyām?
S04n402:53: so'cintyo yogānāṃ cāprameyadhyānānāṃ ca aparisthitaścānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04n402:65: yadi bhagavan likhyamānāyāpi bhūrjaṃ na saṃvidyate,
S04n402:71: tadāpi bhagavan mama nāsti khedaṃ śarīrasya |
S04n402:72: sa ca me mātāpitṛbhūto bhavet gurūṇāmapi guruśca ||
S04n402:73: atha bhagavān sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhiṇaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat–smarāmyahaṃ kulaputra asyāḥ ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ kāraṇena paramāṇurajopamān lokadhātūn paribhramitaḥ |
S04n402:75: na ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sakāśātsacālaṃbāpi (?) śrutā |
S04n402:76: tadā ratnottamo nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
S04n402:78: tadā tena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenābhihitam–mā kulaputra evaṃ karuṇakarūṇānyaśrūṇi pramuñca |
S04n402:79: gaccha kulaputra yena padmottamo nāma lokadhātuḥ |
S04n402:82: tasya kulaputra ahaṃ ratnottamasya tathāgatasyāntikāt prakrāntaḥ |
S04n402:84: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā purastātprāñjalībhūtvottam–labheyamahaṃ bhagavan padmottama ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ rājñīṃ yasyā nāmānusmaraṇamātreṇa sarvapāpāni kṣayante,
S04n402:88: tadā padmottamastathāgata imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāguṇāṃ saṃsmārayati sma–tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate paramāṇurajaḥpramāṇamudgṛhītum,
S04n402:89: na tu kulaputra śakyate ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n402:90: śakyate mayā kulaputra catuḥsamudrasyaikaikāṃ vālukāṃ gaṇayitum,
S04n402:91: na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n402:92: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣo bhavet |
S04n402:93: sa gṛhaṃ pūrṇaṃ yojanasahasraṃ kuryāt dviguṇaṃ pañcayojanaśatāni |
S04n402:98: tadanena paryāyeṇa taṃ gṛhasamūhapratiṣṭhitāstilāḥ parikṣayaparyavadānaṃ yāvatkālena vrajeyuḥ,
S04n402:100: na tu kulaputra śakyate ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n402:101: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturdvīpe nānāvidhāni kṛṣiṃ kārayanti yavagodhūmaśālimudgamāṣādayastilakolakulatthādibhiḥ,
S04n402:106: tataste śakaṭairbhārairmuṭaiḥ piṭhakairgobhirgardabhādibhirlaṅghayitvā tasmin khalābhyantare prakṣiperan,
S04n402:108: śakyate mayā kulaputra ekaikāni phalāni gaṇayitum,
S04n402:109: na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n402:110: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra imā mahānadyo jambudvīpe pravahanti rātrau divā ca |
S04n402:111: tadyathā gaṅgā sītā yamunā sindhuḥ śatadruḥ candrabhāgā erāvatī sumāgandhā himaratī kalaśodarī ceti |
S04n402:113: rātrau ca divā ca mahāsamudre pravahanti |
S04n402:115: tatrāsāṃ mahānadīnāṃ śakyate mayā ekaikabinduṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n402:116: na ca kulaputra śakyate mayā ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n402:117: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturdvīpeṣu catuṣpājjātīnāṃ gogardabhamahiṣāśvahastinaḥ,
S04n402:121: na tu kulaputra ṣaḍākṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ śakyate ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n402:122: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra vajrāṅkuśo nāma parvatarājo navanavatiyojanasahasrāṇyucchrayeṇa caturaśītiyojanasahasrāṇyadhastāt |
S04n402:124: tasya ca pārśve parvatarājasya jarāmaraḥ puruṣo bhavet |
S04n402:126: evaṃ kṛtvā tasya parikṣayaṃ paryavadānaṃ bhavet,
S04n402:129: na tu ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ śakyate ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n402:130: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra mahāsamudraṃ caturaśītiyojanasahasraṃ gāmbhīryeṇa,
S04n402:131: aprameyaṃ vaipulyena vaḍavāmukhaparyantaṃ śakyate mayā śatāgrabhinnayā vālagrakoṭyā ekaikaṃ binduṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n402:132: na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n402:133: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā śīrṣavanasya ekaikapatrāṇi gaṇayitum,
S04n402:134: na tu ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ śakyate ekajāpasya puṇyaskandham gaṇayitum |
S04n402:135: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturdvipanivāsinaṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāste sarve daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n402:138: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra dvādaśamāsikena saṃvatsareṇa adhimāsikena trayodaśamāsikena vā saṃvatsareṇa tathā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā pūrṇa kalpaṃ devo ratrau divā varṣati,
S04n402:139: tacchakyate mayā kulaputra ekaikaṃ binduṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n402:140: na tu kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n402:141: evaṃ kulaputra bahavo matsadṛśāḥ tathāgatakoṭaya ekasthānadhāritā divyaṃ kalpaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvopakaraṇopasthāne nopasthitā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n402:142: na ca tathāgatāḥ śaknuvanti ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
S04n402:150: evaṃ kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā upāyakauśalyaṃ prāptumahamapi kulaputra anekāni lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi paribhramitaḥ |
S04n402:151: gatvā cāmitābhasya tathāgatasya purastātprāñjalībhūtvā dharmavegenāśrūṇi pramuktāni,
S04n402:153: tena mamābhihitam–kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ rājñīmicchasi bhāvanāyogamanuyuktaḥ ?
S04n402:155: yathā tṛṣārtaḥ pānīyamanveṣate evamahaṃ bhagavan ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ samanveṣamāṇo'nekalokadhātūnupasaṃkrāntaḥ |
S04n402:157: na kasyacitsakāśānmayā labdhā ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā rājñī |
S04n402:166: athāmitābhasya tathāgatārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya lambikarutena svareṇa nirghoṣeṇārocayati–pasya kulaputra ayaṃ padmottamastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ ṣaḍakṣarīmahāvidyāyāḥ kāraṇenānekalokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi paribhramitaḥ |
